definition: four types of human emotions, namely: happiness 歡喜|欢喜[huan1 xi3], anger 憤怒|愤怒[fen4 nu4], sorrow 悲哀[bei1 ai1] and joy 快樂|快乐[kuai4 le4]
to be fond of/to like/to enjoy/to be happy/to feel pleased/happiness/delight/glad
Ai (c. 2000 BC), sixth of legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God, also known as Li 釐|厘[Li2]
sorrow/grief/pity/to grieve for/to pity/to lament/to condole

sentences.english: Let your baby know that you hear his babbles, coos, and gurgles .
sentences.chinese: 讓孩子知道你在聽他咿咿呀呀，關心他的喜怒哀樂。

sentences.english: Why is there also feeling in game?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼在遊戲裏也有喜怒哀樂？

sentences.english: We would like to tell her everything about us---happiness and sadness.
sentences.chinese: 我們願意把自己的喜怒哀樂告訴她。

sentences.english: So people will be more spiritual, feeling the pains and joys of others.
sentences.chinese: 因此，人們更加高尚地去體會別人的喜怒哀樂。

sentences.english: We get together and catch up and share our joys and sorrows.
sentences.chinese: 我們相聚在一起分享喜怒哀樂。

sentences.english: Finally in the family of the passions. " A variety of flavor and taste."
sentences.chinese: 也終於在家庭的喜怒哀樂裏細品了各種滋味和情趣。

sentences.english: Dream and reality gap, joys and sorrows, and might be sensitized mixed feelings.
sentences.chinese: 夢想與現實的差距，喜怒哀樂，悲歡離合，百感交集。

definition: bit by bit/dribs and drabs/the little details/every aspect
to reckon/to calculate/to plan/to expect/to scheme
to find amusement in one's own way/to enjoy oneself quietly
to release (tension)/relief (from suspense)/to dispel (usu. with negative, unable to forget)
to worry about/to be concerned about
to throw out/to get rid of
